title: [DATA LOST]
content:
[[module CSS]]

.body-text {
    margin: 2% 13% 2% 9%;
    padding: 5px 20px 5px 20px;
    background-color: #f2f2f2;
    color: #111;
}

.text4desk {
    width: 70%;
    margin: auto;
}

@media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

    .body-text {
        margin: 0% 4% 0% 4%;
    }

    .text4desk {
        width:100%;
    }

}


[[/module]]
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#f2f2c2; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
++ [DATA LOST]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[table style="border: none; width: 100%;"]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[size 125%]]**UNDOCUMENTED**[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right;"]]
[[size 125%]]###990000|**NaN CLEARANCE DETECTED**##[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell]]
[[size 125%]]**[DATA LOST]**[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: right;"]]
[[size 125%]]###990000|**THIS FILE IS NaN CLASSIFIED**##[[/size]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

------

[[<]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-4947/scp-blank.png|caption=[DATA LOST]]]
[[/<]]

**Special Containment Procedures:** [DATA LOST]

**Description:** [DATA LOST]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[=]]
[[div style="background: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-great-hippo/scp_trans.png) center no-repeat ; float: center; border: solid 2px #000000; padding: 1px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2);"]] 
+ WARNING: ƟU-055 DETECTS THE PRESENCE OF A TYPE-X MNESTIC INFOHAZARD TO A CERTAINTY OF 67% IN THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE
----
+++ ARE YOU SURE YOU WISH TO CONTINUE?
[[/div]]
[[size 200%]][[collapsible show="RE: 4947" hide="Access granted"]][[/size]]
[[<]]
[[div class="body-text"]]
On [DATA LOST], you sent the following message to O5_11@Scipnet:
> **From:** YYarkoni@Scipnet (Senior Researcher Yehezkel Yarkoni; Classification Level XF-3; Employee Number 2677)
> **To:** O5_11@Scipnet (Overseer Eleven; Classification Level OK-5-Thaumiel; Employee Number 11)
> **Subject:** 4947
> **DATE:** [DATA LOST]
> 
> I can't do this anymore.
> 
> 4947's documentation won't stop vanishing. I've tried everything I can: paper, electronic, having my coworkers memorize everything. None of it works. Within a week, it's all gone, and I'm forced to write everything on my own. Not that it matters.
> 
> Documents have a shelf life of a day, three if I'm lucky. Every morning, me and 2000 have to recompile everything into something everyone else can work with, even for only a day. Do you know what it feels like to see your life's work disappear into the ether, day after day?
> 
> Nobody even cares. I can bring it up to anyone I want, and if I'm lucky they'll immediately forget. If not, they remember for a day or two, and against all logic I'm back to hoping, right up until I see that vacant stare in their eyes. Again. Mnestics give me an extra day at most, but eventually they forget everything. I don't have the funding to be regularly dosing with class Xs.
> 
> Administration won't let me get out. I've forgotten how many transfer requests I put out. No answer. I doubt they remember 4947 long enough to take me out.
> 
> I can't even quit. The moment I do, me and Rivka are out on the streets. I can't take her out of AL.
> 
> I just want this to stop.
On [DATA LOST], O5_11@Scipnet responded:
> **From:** O5_11@Scipnet (Overseer Eleven; Classification Level OK-5-Thaumiel; Employee Number 11)
> **To:** YYarkoni@Scipnet (Senior Researcher Yehezkel Yarkoni; Classification Level XF-3; Employee Number 2677)
> **Subject:** Re: 4947
> **DATE:** [DATA LOST]
> 
> Hello, Researcher Yarkoni.
> 
> I have reviewed your message. Frankly, I am as appalled as you are at the negligence that has been shown towards SCP-4947's project. I am sincerely sorry you had to go through something like this.
> 
> I cannot do much, I'm afraid, but promise you that on my authority as O5-11, SCP-4947 will be archived if its documentation cannot be fixed within 168 hours of this very moment, and that ƟU-1875 will see to it that this order is fulfilled. You'll be getting the alert soon enough. 
> 
> Godspeed, Researcher Yarkoni.
[[/div]]
[[/<]]
[[size 150%]][[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4947/offset/5|SCP-4947 has been updated.]]][[/size]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/=]]
author: UraniumEmpire
